channel.title: Will host a private server for free
channel.description:
it must have high amount of hits daily.
downtime: i will take the server offline for less then an hour a day and on week ends it will be on untill sunday 8:00 then it shuts down for a hour.
what you get: a admin panel to shut down server run virus scans etc. FTP access.
specs. 6 gig of space no cd drive or floppy disk drive. windows 2000.
thats all pm me for details.

bye

Even so, if you can host mine, which is a private server at the moment, I’ll appreciate it.
